name: Violet's Awakening
description:
Violet's Awakening

Dungeon Crawler game made by Rafa Skoberg in association with Digital Innovation One for education purposes.

Inspired by Zelda: Link's Awakening and Tunic.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Jump: Space Bar
Sword and Shield: Mouse Buttons

Third-Party Assets

This game wouldn't even exist without all the awesome assets available online, both on Unity's AssetStore and other sites. Thank you asset creators for sharing your hard work with game developers from all around the world! Here's the list of all assets used in this project:

  • RPG Tiny Hero Duo PBR Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • RPG Monster Duo PBR Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • RPG Monster Partners PBR Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • Mini Legion Rock Golem PBR HP Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • Mini Legion Lich PBR HP Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • Mini Legion Grunt PBR HP Polyart by Dungeon Mason
  • 3D Dungeon Lowpoly Pack by CatBorg Studio
  • Polygonal's Low-Poly Particle Pack by Polygonal Stuff
  • RPG Essentials Sound Effects by leohpaz
  • Hit VFX Mega Pack by Just Labbing
  • Sprite Packs by Kenney
  • Music tracks by Kevin MacLeod: incompetech.com
  • Sound effects (CC0) obtained on freesound.org
